nature_language: [当前位置广州,目标位置北京,旅行人数2,旅行天数4] 两个人计划从广州出发坐飞机去北京玩四天，尽可能交通便利一些，行程不要太赶，想看看历史古迹
nature_language_en: [Current location: Guangzhou, Destination: Beijing, Number of travelers: 2, Travel days: 4] Two people are planning to fly from Guangzhou to Beijing for a four-day trip. They want the transportation to be as convenient as possible, the itinerary not to be too rushed, and they wish to see historical sites.
